plot: 8 minor celebrities spend the night in a haunted castle. Strange noises, screaming celebs and a séance. Viewers can expel celebs (like Big Brother) the sole surviving winner gets to donate money to charity.
plot_en: 8 minor celebrities spend the night in a haunted castle. Strange noises, screaming celebs and a séance. Viewers can expel celebs (like Big Brother) the sole surviving winner gets to donate money to charity.

title: I'm Famous and Frightened
